tool.name: Online data

param.name: url_paste
param.label: URL
param.help: Here you may specify a list of URLs (one per line).

param.name: whitelist
param.label: Whitlist of filename extensions
param.help: Please specify a list of file extensions witch should be extracted. (default: sdf, mol, smi, inchi). Every line one extension.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
Fetch data via FTP or HTTP and store them in your history.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
Supported filetypes are: - gz/gzip - rar
ZIP is supported with recursive extracting of specific filetypes.
